Japanese: シーラ：
English: Sheila:

Japanese: シーラ：
English: Sheila:

Japanese: ここに飾られてる絵は？
English: What are these photos hanging over here?

Japanese: クーガー：５秒経過
English: Cooger: 5 seconds...

Japanese: クーガー：１０秒経過
English: Cooger: 10 seconds...

Japanese: クーガー：１５秒経過
English: Cooger: 15 seconds...

Japanese: コール：ドク、やっぱり人間じゃあ無理なんだよ‥‥。
English: Cole: Doc, it doesn't work on humans...

Japanese: クーガー：どうやら夢を見ていたようだな‥‥‥。
English: Cooger: I guess a resurrection drug for humans is just a dream...

Japanese: ええ‥‥‥別に構いませんが‥‥‥。
English: Sure... I don't really mind...

Japanese: ここに飾られてる絵は？
English: What are these photos hanging over here?

Japanese: 有名な学者さん達です。私も科学者の端くれですから、こういった人達に憧れるんですよ。
English: They're famous scientists. I'm a bit of a scientist myself, so I look up to these people.

Japanese: コール‥‥‥こちら１６分署の刑事さん。
English: Kole... This is an officer from the 16th district.

Japanese: 初めまして、コールです。
English: Nice to meet you, I'm Kole.

Japanese: 今晩はコール君、私はジャック・キースマン。
English: Good evening, Kole. My name is Jack Kirshman.

Japanese: 君達はこんな夜中にここで何をしているんだ？
English: What are you two doing here at this time of night?

Japanese: はい、近々パーティをやろうと思いまして、ドク‥‥いや、教授と相談してた所ですよ。
English: We've been thinking of holding a party soon and I've just been discussing it with Doc... I mean, with the Professor.

Japanese: なるほど、そうだったんですか。ところでクーガーさん、ここではどんな研究をなさっているんですか？
English: I see. By the way, Mr. Cooger, What kind of research are you doing over here?

Japanese: ガン細胞の研究が主ですが‥‥いつもライバルに先を超されてしまってね、私も歳をとったのかね。
English: My main focus is on cancer cell research... But my rivals always beat me to it. I've grown old, you see.

Japanese: ん！？　今の声は？
English: Hm?! What was that voice?

Japanese: 裏のノラ猫でしょう。家の裏はゴミ捨て場になってますから、ディナーを食べによく集まるんですよ。
English: Must be stray cats from behind the house. There's a garbage dump, so they often gather there for dinner.

Japanese: 墓地もあるしね、デザート付きですよ。
English: There's also a graveyard, so they can have dessert.

Japanese: ははは、なるほど。あなた方も誤ってサラダにならないように頼みますよ。
English: Ha ha ha, I see. I hope they don't mistake you for the salad.

Japanese: それでは私はこれで‥‥‥何かお気付きになった事があったら知らせてください。
English: Well, I'll be going, then... If you notice anything, please call and let me know.

Japanese: どうもご苦労様です。
English: Thank you for your hard work.

Japanese: ん？　ちょっと待ってください。今の声はあそこの冷蔵庫の辺りから聞こえてきませんでした？
English: Hm? Wait a second. Didn't you just hear a voice coming from the refrigerator over there?

Japanese: いえ、あの冷蔵庫には薬品しか入っていませんから。
English: No, there's nothing but medicine in there.

Japanese: ほら、やっぱりあそこから聞こえてきますね。開けてもよろしいですか？
English: See? I definitely heard something. May I please open it?

Japanese: ええ、別に構いませんが‥‥‥。
English: Sure, I don't really mind...

Japanese: 〔ドク、ヤバイよ！！　どうして断らないんだよ！？〕
English: (Doc, that's bad!! Why didn't you refuse?!)

Japanese: 〔断ったら逆に怪しまれるだろ！？　今までに蘇生薬を打った動物は全て２分以内で絶命するというデータが出ているんだ〕
English: (If I did it would've been suspicious, wouldn't it?! Up until now every animal injected with the resurrection drug expired within two mintes.)

Japanese: 〔だ、だってあの猫まだ生きてるよ！？　どうするんだよ！？〕
English: (B-But, that cat is still alive, isn't it?! What are we going to do?!)

Japanese: ウワァアアアア‥‥‥‥‥‥！！
English: UWAAAAAAAAA.........!!

Japanese: ドク！！　ジャックさんが！！
English: Doc!! Jack's...!!!

Japanese: ドク、どうしたんだよ！！　早くジャックさんを病院に連れていかないと！！
English: Doc, what are you doing?! We have to take him to hospital immediately!

Japanese: もう手遅れだよ、ジャックは喉を掻き切られてしまったよ。頚静脈と‥‥‥頚動脈も見事に切断されているな。
English: It's too late. Kitty slashed his throat. The jugular vein and the carotid artery are completely severed.

Japanese: キティは！？
English: What about Kitty?!

Japanese: キティは完全に死んでるよ。最後の力でジャックの喉を‥‥‥。
English: She's completely dead. She used her final strength to slash Jack's...

Japanese: ど、どうするんだよ！！　このままじゃ俺達、殺人犯じゃないか！！
English: W-What are we going to do?!! They're going to say we murdered him!!

Japanese: ‥‥‥そうだ！　大丈夫だよ、実際に生き返る所を見せてやれば‥‥‥！！
English: ...I know! We'll be fine. We just have to tell them about Kitty coming back to life...!!

Japanese: ドク、何とか言えよ！？　こうなったら本当の事を警察に話して‥‥‥。
English: Doc, Say something! We have to tell the truth to the police...

Japanese: お前さんだって蘇生薬の効能を疑ってたろ！！　本当の事を話したところで素直に信じる警察官などがいると思うのかね！？
English: Even you doubted that it really works, didn't you?! Do you really think a police officer would just take our word for it?!

Japanese: 頭がおかしくなってるとしか思わないよ。警察が我々に弁明の余地を与えてくれるはずがないだろう！！
English: They'll think we've gone mad. There's no way the police are going to accept that kind of explanation.

Japanese: やっちゃった相手が警官なんだ。我々の行くつくところは電気椅子か、ガス室でたんまりとシアンの芳香を嗅ぐ事になるだろうな‥‥‥
English: A police officer is dead. We'll both be sent to the electric chair, or to inhale some cyanide inside a gas chamber.

Japanese: い、いやだよ！　どうすればいいんだよ！！　このまま放っておけばすぐに見つかるぞ！！
English: F-Fuck that! What should we do?! They're going to discover us in no time!

Japanese: キティはジャックの喉に噛付いたよな？
English: Kitty bit Jack's throat, didn't she?

Japanese: そうだけど‥‥‥何か案が？
English: She did, yeah... Did you think of something?

Japanese: あの蘇生薬は素がヴィールスなんだよ。サンプルは精製が充分じゃない。生菌がウヨウヨしているんだよ。
English: The resurrection drug is basically a virus. It's far from being refined, and has living microorganisms swarming inside it.

Japanese: 粘膜感染‥‥‥つまり、噛まれたり引っ掻かれたりすると感染してしまうんだ。傷口から感染したヴィールスが脳に伝わって‥‥‥。
English: Membrane infection... That is, when you get bitten, you get infected. The virus goes from the open wound into the brain...

Japanese: ‥‥‥という事は、ジャックはゾンビになっちゃうのか！？
English: ...You mean Jack's going to turn into a zombie?!

Japanese: いや、それは判らない。さっきも言ったように、今まで人間に試した事は一度もないんだ。
English: I don't know. As I told you before, I haven't tested the drug on humans at all.

Japanese: だが、１つだけ言える事は、これだけ時間が経っているのにジャックはピクリともしないという事実だ。
English: But there's one thing I *can* say. It's been a while now and Jack isn't moving at all.

Japanese: 人間の方が身体が大きい。つまり体容積が猫に比べて大きいため、キティに噛まれた程度の微量では、効果が現れるまでに多少の時間が必要なんだろう。
English: Humans have larger bodies. That is, since our body mass is bigger than that of a cat, the miniscule amount carried by Kitty's bite would take a long time to take effect.

Japanese: 確かにキティは飼い猫だけれど、元々が攻撃的な動物だったために狂暴化してしまったのかもしれない。獣よりも人間の方が理性が強いのは説明するまでもないだろう。
English: Kitty was a pet cat, but since cats are naturally violent animals her feral instincts must have taken over. Humans, on the other hand, are rational beings.

Japanese: つまり‥‥‥人間は猫と違って狂暴性がないって事か？
English: You mean... humans won't go feral like a cat would?

Japanese: はっきりした事はまだ判らないが、とにかくこのままではラチがあかないからな。一度生き返らせてみるしかないだろう。
English: I can't say anything for sure, but... We're making no progress. We have to try and bring him back to life.

Japanese: とりあえずジャックが生き返ってくれさえすれば、死刑だけは免れられるよな‥‥‥。
English: Yeah, if we do we can avoid the death penalty.

Japanese: 駄目だったら‥‥‥やっぱり死刑か？
English: Cause if it doesn't work... we're dead, right?

Japanese: コール、離れていたまえ。もし失敗したら、この銃で奴を撃て。
English: Cole, please step away. If it fails, shoot him with this gun.
Got it...

Japanese: やった、目を覚ましたぞ！！　コール、銃を構えて！！
English: He opened his eyes!! Cole, put the gun away!!

Japanese: ジ、ジャックが‥‥‥‥！！　生き返った‥‥‥！！
English: J-Jack... came back to life...!!

Japanese: ジャックさん、判りますか！？　私です、クーガーです！！
English: Officer Jack, can you understand me?! It's me, Doctor Cooger!!

Japanese: ウ、ウウウウウ‥‥‥‥。
English: U...Uuuuuuuu.....

Japanese: ジャックさん、聞こえますか！？　ジャックさん、私ですよ！！
English: Officer Jack, can you hear me?! It's me, officer Jack!!

Japanese: グァアアアアア！！！\nCole: ドク、危ない！！
English: Guaaaaaa!!!\nCole: Doc, look out!!

Japanese: いくら撃っても死なないじゃないか！！\nCooger: コール！！　先に表へ逃げろ、わしもすぐ行く！！
English: He doesn't die no matter how much I shoot him!!\nCooger: Cole!! Try to escape, I'll follow soon!!

Japanese: 一緒に逃げようよ！！
English: We should escape together!!

Japanese: さっさと行け！！！
English: Just go!!

Japanese: 判った、急いでくれ！！
English: Got it, but hurry!!

Japanese: ドク、墓地だ！！
English: Doc, it's the graveyard!!

Japanese: この中へ逃げよう！！　なんとか奴をまくんだ！！
English: Let's go in!! We'll lose him somehow!!

Japanese: ハアハア‥‥何が人間は狂暴性がないだよ！！　ジャックの理性はどこに行ったんだ！？
English: *pant* *pant*... What was that about humans having no feral instincts?! Where's that rationality you were talking about?!

Japanese: 所詮、人間の祖先は猿なのだよ‥‥ハアハア‥‥‥。
English: When all is said and done, humans are descended from monkeys... *pant* *pant*

Japanese: は、話が違うじゃないか！！　ハアハア‥‥‥。
English: T-That's the opposite of what you told me before!! *pant* *pant*

Japanese: そ、そのバッグは‥‥？
English: W-What's in that bag...?

Japanese: 蘇生薬だ！　そ、それで奴はまだ追いかけて来てるか‥‥‥？　ハアハア‥‥‥
English: It's the ressurection drug! B-But is he still after us...? *pant* *pant*

Japanese: まだ‥‥まだ追いかけて来てるよ！！
English: He's... He's still coming!!

Japanese: な、なんてしつこい奴なんだ‥‥‥はあはあ‥‥‥。
English: H-He's very insistent... *pant* *pant*

Japanese: うわっ！！
English: Uwa!!

Japanese: ドク！！　大丈夫か！？
English: Doc!! Are you alright?!

Japanese: い、いかん！！　蘇生薬が‥‥‥！！
English: N-No!! My resurrection drug...!

Japanese: ドク、ジャックが来る！！　早く行こう！！
English: Doc, Jack is coming!! We have to run!!

Japanese: 私の蘇生薬が！！
English: My resurrection drug!!

Japanese: 薬ならまた作ればいいだろ！！　早く逃げよう！！
English: You can make more later!! Let's run!!
